subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pedro Alvarez, a 14th-round draft pick in 2005 out of Horace Mann School in the Bronx, is projected among the top three picks in the Major League Baseball’s amateur draft on June 5
snippet: Pedro Alvarez, a 14th-round draft pick in 2005 out of Horace Mann School in the Bronx, is projected among the top three picks in the Major League Baseball’s amateur draft on June 5
